page.title: 12FARMING AND AGRICULTURE
page.content: The whole of our area, apart from the villages, is used for agriculture. This is mainly arable farming with large crops of wheat, barley, rape, beans, peas and grass. There are a few farms which do have animals but these are mainly kept for the farmers' own needs. Three nurseries have developed, each specialising in different produce. At Smiths Green the nursery grows tomatoes and cucumbers, at Hope End they concentrate on house plants and at Langthorns, unusual shrubs and heathers. In season, other small home based outlets emerge along the A120 as people sell flowers and produce to the passing motorists.
